title: Thanks for nothing, Riot Games
body:
So here's a funny story....

One day just enjoying some league, casually playing, get into my promos!
You may be thinking, "Wow, awesome man!"
But no,
no no no
I get a bunch of int feeders, so yep, I got a bit mad, not even as mad as I've seen most. But hey! Guess who got chat banned? 
I did. And the int feeders, well, they got no punishment at all.
So hey Riot, want to maybe take a good solid look at this? I have had some EXTREMELY toxic people, who use racism, sexism, and more to harass me, and they NEVER get banned, so why me?

DO NOT FORGET: Riot based this 10 day chat ban on ONE GAME! ONE SINGLE GAME! WTF?

replies.body:
So here is the ONLY game that RIOT based a 10 GAME chat ban off of....
Some messages were toxic yes, but that is due to int feeding. I was even positive too..


Game 1

RylanTheAsian: u just sit there
RylanTheAsian: LOOK AT THE DAMAGE TALON DOES
RylanTheAsian: ALL U GOTTA DO IS GO IN
RylanTheAsian: SO I DONT DIE
RylanTheAsian: ITS SO EASY
RylanTheAsian: yes but if rek wouldve engage
RylanTheAsian: easy fight
RylanTheAsian: if it were your promos, and game was like this, would u be chillin?

RylanTheAsian: but u stay

RylanTheAsian: i even typed it

Nothing in your chat log indicates that u had int feeder, which is shown in your match history too. U played Draven and like every other salty Draven, you blamed your support, told him to kill himself and were overall toxic and negative. You are on a quick path towards perma ban with such behavior

Maybe because you can't see THEIR chat logs? LMAO

People are so soft, it's ridiculous

> [{quoted}](name=RylanTheAsian,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=emEff1Is,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2017-08-30T19:53:28.455+0000)
>
> Maybe because you can't see THEIR chat logs? LMAO
> 
> People are so soft, it's ridiculous

How is their chat log relevant? Nowhere in your chat log are you implying person is intentionally feeding. All i see is you trying to tell everyone what to do, pointing out everyones mistakes, blaming everyone and especially Bard. Only time u actually mentioned inting is when enemy team pointed out that you are being toxic, in which  response u said how your entire team is "inting" showing that you are not willing to accept that opponent is better and that only reason you could lose is because your team was trying to lose on purpose.
You're lucky it's only a chat ban, usually "kys" results in an instant 14 day ban.
Funny cuz people say that every single game. Never get banned

HAHAHAHHAHAHAHA. 

I tried to laugh about it but it's not funny and you are acting like a jerk in that chatlogs. You wouldn't dare to do that shit in reallife when you meet other people on a random soccer place. GROW SOME MANNERS.

> [{quoted}](name=RylanTheAsian,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=emEff1Is,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-08-30T08:22:46.954+0000)
>
> Funny cuz people say that every single game. Never get banned

Well, the player behaviour board kinda indicates otherwise lol.

> DO NOT FORGET: Riot based this 10 day chat ban on ONE GAME! ONE SINGLE GAME! WTF?

don't forget, the punishment message probably said this is a SAMPLE of your toxic gameS.  You are delusional if you think this is the ONLY game that fuel your toxic meter.

If you are talking about your Draven game, I don't think anybody was inting. I think that your team was just outplayed and you are being salty.

Granted, I could be wrong (just like you could be.), but based off your teams KDA not a single person on your team went negative. "But Bard went 1/10!" Yes he did, but did you account for the assists? He went 1/10/9 which means he had a 1 KDA. Reksai is the same way.

If this is the game, it was honestly an uphill battle. You have an all AD team with no to minimal peel. While the enemy had Blitz and Lee for strong engaging and Akali and Quinn to nuke you.

Yes, because you were not actually in the game, you cannot tell if I'm being honest or not. The score looks fine, but the issue is that they would feed kills periodically to the other team if I did something they didn't like, or follow up when they were just diving for fun

They would feed kills periodically? You mean like getting caught out or overextending? Something that happens in games. Unless they blatantly declared they were inting, then without any other evidence, I will not believe they inted.

I don't vote in polls, but I will comment in reguard to it.

You should definitely be punished for your toxic behavior, unless your chat logs prove otherwise.

If the other people were in fact intentionally feeding and you can prove their intent, then they should be punished as well.
My issue is that I was not even very toxic, and was giving tips to make their gameplay better. The chat logs riot used in the ban were not even toxic...so that's why I'm confused
Would you mind posting them then?
How do I do that?
When you log in you should have a Reform card that pops up. You can then copy to clipboard your chat logs that it shows, and then you can just paste them here.
I already clicked "I understand" and idk how to get them back
I think it shows up again if you log out of the client then log back in. I think.
This is another case of "Why am I being arrested for killing a guy? That person killed 2 guys!"

Haha not at all, I'm just curious as to why I get my rewards taken away, after I have been nothing but kind in my games, then when someone feeds my ranked promos (griefing) I ask "Why you feeding?" and "Can you stop?" but then get banned?

>after I have been nothing but kind in my games

Post the logs.
Will try

in·ten·tion·al
inˈten(t)SH(ə)n(ə)l
adjective
done on purpose; deliberate.
"intentional wrongdoing and harm"
synonyms:	deliberate, calculated, conscious, intended, planned, meant, studied, knowing, willful, purposeful, purposive, done on purpose, premeditated, preplanned, preconceived; rarewitting
"intentional contamination of our food supply is a real threat"

This might help you out a bit, OP.

> and they NEVER get banned  

That is patently false, if they are behaving the way you are describing then they will get banned just like you telling people to kill themselves will also get you banned. You deserve this ban, stop blaming others, own up to your mistakes and improve yourself.

I got into a normal game evelynn started to int because i would help her in her jungle because yi was there backing. she runs into my lane gives 4 kills and calls me trash and i deserve to lose every game and i needed to vent myself being a little salty. i report her for inting and then guess what happens chat restriction and they run off with nothing happening to them
Exactly what happened to me man
